member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask
member.summary: Contains integer values that are used for the attribute.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritAll
member.summary: The business inherits all inheritance values. Value = 0x3ff.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritCompetitor
member.summary: The business inherits competitors from its parent business. Value = 8.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritEmailTemplate
member.summary: The business inherits email templates from its parent business. Value = 2.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritNone
member.summary: The business does not inherit from its parent business. Value = 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritProcessTemplate
member.summary: All child business units inherit process templates from this business. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritReferralSource
member.summary: All child business units inherit referral sources from this business. Value = 4.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.InheritSalesProcess
member.summary: The business inherits sale processes from its parent business. Value = 0x10.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.MustInheritCompetitor
member.summary: The business inherits competitors from its parent business. Value = 0x100.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.MustInheritEmailTemplate
member.summary: All child business units inherit email templates from this business. Value = 0x40.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.MustInheritProcessTemplate
member.summary: The business inherits process templates from its parent business. Value = 0x20.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.MustInheritReferralSource
member.summary: All child business units inherit referral sources from this business. Value = 0x80.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.BusinessUnitInheritanceMask.MustInheritSalesProcess
member.summary: The business inherits sale processes from its parent business. Value = 0x200.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.CalendarRuleExtentCode
member.summary: Contains integer flags that are used for the attribute.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.CalendarRuleExtentCode.SubtractRecurrenceIntervals
member.summary: The recurrence duration determines the shadowing of that rule. Use this value to indicate working hours and a full day 24-hour shadow. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.CalendarRuleExtentCode.SubtractResults
member.summary: Only the rule duration is shadowed. Use this value to indicate time off. For example, 4 hours of time off allow working hours to appear before and after. Value = 2.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.CalendarRuleExtentCode.Transparent
member.summary: No shadowing of calendar rules. All rules are displayed even if they are shadowed or preceded by other rules. Value = 0.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.ListMemberType
member.summary: Contains integer flags that are used for the attribute, used to indicate whether a list specifies accounts, contacts, or leads.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.ListMemberType.Account
member.summary: A list of accounts. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.ListMemberType.Contact
member.summary: A list of contacts. Value = 2.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.ListMemberType.Lead
member.summary: A list of leads. Value = 4.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights
member.summary: Contains the possible access rights for a user.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.AppendAccess
member.summary: The right to append the specified record to another object. Value = 4 (0x04).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.AppendToAccess
member.summary: The right to append another record to the specified object. Value = 16 (0x10).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.AssignAccess
member.summary: The right to assign the specified record to another user or team. Value = 524288 (0x80000).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.CreateAccess
member.summary: The right to create a record. Value = 32 (0x20).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.DeleteAccess
member.summary: The right to delete the specified record. Value = 65536 (0x10000).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.None
member.summary: No access. Value = 0 (0x00).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.ReadAccess
member.summary: The right to read the specified type of record. Value = 1 (0x01).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.ShareAccess
member.summary: The right to share the specified record. Value = 262144 (0x40000).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.AccessRights.WriteAccess
member.summary: The right to update the specified record. Value = 2 (0x02).

member.summary: Indicates basic privileges. Users who have basic privileges can only use privileges to perform actions on objects that are owned by, or shared with, the user. Value = 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.PrivilegeDepth.Deep
member.summary: Indicates deep privileges. Users who have deep privileges can perform actions on all objects in the user's current business units and all objects down the hierarchy of business units. Value = 2.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.PrivilegeDepth.Global
member.summary: Indicates global privileges. Users who have global privileges can perform actions on data and objects anywhere within the organization regardless of the business unit or user to which it belongs. Value = 3.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.PrivilegeDepth.Local
member.summary: Indicates local privileges. Users who have local privileges can only use privileges to perform actions on data and objects that are in the user's current business unit. Value = 1.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode
member.summary: Contains the possible values for a subcode, used in scheduling appointments. For the Web API use the SubCode EnumType.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Appointment
member.summary: A block of time that is already scheduled for an appointment. Value = 7.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Break
member.summary: A block of time that cannot be committed due to a scheduled break. Value = 4.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Committed
member.summary: A block of time that is committed to perform an action. Value = 2.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Holiday
member.summary: A block of time that cannot be scheduled due to a scheduled holiday. Value = 5.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.ResourceCapacity
member.summary: Specifies the capacity of a resource for the specified time interval. Value = 10.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.ResourceServiceRestriction
member.summary: A restriction for a resource for the specified service. Value = 9.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.ResourceStartTime
member.summary: Specifies to filter a resource start time. Value = 8.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Schedulable
member.summary: A schedulable block of time. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.ServiceCost
member.summary: An override to the service cost for the specified time block. Value = 12.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.ServiceRestriction
member.summary: Specifies that a service is restricted during the specified block of time. Value = 11.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Uncommitted
member.summary: A block of time that is tentatively scheduled but not committed. Value = 3.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Unspecified
member.summary: Specifies free time with no specified restrictions. Value = 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.SubCode.Vacation
member.summary: A block of time that cannot be scheduled due to a scheduled vacation. Value = 6.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TargetFieldType.All
member.summary: Initialize all possible attribute values. Value = 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TargetFieldType.ValidForCreate
member.summary: Initialize the attribute values that are valid for create. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TargetFieldType.ValidForRead
member.summary: Initialize the attribute values that are valid for read. Value = 3.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TargetFieldType.ValidForUpdate

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TimeCode.Available
member.summary: The time is available within the working hours of the resource. Value = 0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TimeCode.Busy
member.summary: The time is committed to an activity. Value = 1.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TimeCode.Filter
member.summary: Use additional filters for the time block such as service cost or service start time. Value = 3.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Crm.Sdk.Messages.TimeCode.Unavailable
member.summary: The time is unavailable. Value = 2.
